umrahByAir.title: Premium Umrah Package by Air - 7 Days
umrahByAir.description: Experience a premium Umrah journey with our 7-day package by air. This comprehensive package includes comfortable flights, premium hotel accommodations near the Haram, guided tours, and all necessary arrangements for a spiritual and memorable pilgrimage.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, transfer to Mecca. Check-in at hotel and rest.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Umrah Performance
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, visit the Grand Mosque, and spend time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, check-in at hotel near the Prophet's Mosque.

itinerary.title: Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, historical sites, and spend time in prayer.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight.

highlights: Premium hotel accommodation near the Grand Mosque

umrahByAir.title: Deluxe Umrah Package by Air - 10 Days
umrahByAir.description: Experience a deluxe Umrah journey with our 10-day package by air. This extended package offers more time for spiritual reflection, premium accommodations, and visits to multiple holy cities including Jeddah and Riyadh.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, transfer to Mecca. Check-in at deluxe hotel near the Haram and rest after the journey.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Umrah Performance
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, spend extended time at the Grand Mosque, perform multiple Tawaf and Sai, and engage in prayers and spiritual reflection.

itinerary.title: Visit Jeddah
itinerary.description: Day trip to Jeddah to explore the historic city, visit the Corniche, and experience the local culture before returning to Mecca.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, check-in at deluxe hotel near the Prophet's Mosque.

itinerary.title: Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, historical sites including Quba Mosque, and spend time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Visit Riyadh
itinerary.description: Optional day trip to Riyadh to explore the capital city and its landmarks.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight.

inclusions: All ground transportation including city tours
City tours to Jeddah and Riyadh
highlights: Deluxe hotel accommodation near the Grand Mosque

umrahByAir.title: Luxury Umrah Package by Air - 14 Days
umrahByAir.description: Indulge in a luxurious 14-day Umrah experience with our premium package by air. This comprehensive journey includes 5-star accommodations, visits to all major holy cities, and exclusive experiences for the ultimate spiritual pilgrimage.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, VIP transfer to Mecca. Check-in at luxury 5-star hotel with direct view of the Haram.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Extended Umrah Experience
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, spend extensive time at the Grand Mosque, perform multiple Tawaf and Sai, visit historical sites, and engage in deep spiritual reflection and prayers.

itinerary.title: Visit Taif
itinerary.description: Day trip to Taif, the mountain resort city, to enjoy the cooler climate and visit historical sites including the Shubra Palace.

itinerary.title: Visit Jeddah
itinerary.description: Explore Jeddah's historic Al-Balad district, visit the Corniche, and experience the Red Sea coastline.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, VIP transfer to luxury hotel near the Prophet's Mosque with premium amenities.

itinerary.title: Medina Extended Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, Quba Mosque, historical sites including Uhud Mountain, and spend extended time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Visit Riyadh
itinerary.description: Day trip to Riyadh to explore the capital, visit the National Museum, and experience modern Saudi Arabia.

itinerary.title: Return to Jeddah
itinerary.description: Return to Jeddah for final shopping and preparation for departure.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight with VIP assistance.

inclusions: All ground transportation including luxury vehicles
Visa processing assistance with priority service
City tours to Taif, Jeddah, and Riyadh
highlights: Visits to all major holy cities

umrahByAir.title: Economy Umrah Package by Air - 5 Days
umrahByAir.description: An affordable and efficient 5-day Umrah package by air, perfect for those with limited time. This budget-friendly option includes all essential services for a complete Umrah experience.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive at King Abdulaziz International Airport, transfer to Mecca. Check-in at hotel and brief orientation.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Umrah Performance
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, visit the Grand Mosque, complete Tawaf and Sai, and spend time in prayer at the holy sites.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by air, check-in at hotel near the Prophet's Mosque.

itinerary.title: Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, offer prayers, and visit key historical sites.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure flight.

umrahByBus.title: Standard Umrah Package by Bus - 10 Days
umrahByBus.description: Experience a comfortable and affordable 10-day Umrah journey by bus. This standard package offers excellent value with comfortable bus travel, quality accommodations, and all essential services for a complete pilgrimage experience.

itinerary.description: Begin the journey by comfortable air-conditioned bus. Travel with fellow pilgrims in a group setting with rest stops along the way.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jeddah, brief rest stop, then continue to Mecca. Check-in at hotel near the Haram.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Umrah Performance
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, visit the Grand Mosque multiple times, complete Tawaf and Sai, and spend extended time in prayer and spiritual reflection.

itinerary.title: Visit Jeddah
itinerary.description: Day trip to Jeddah to explore the historic city, visit the Corniche, and experience local culture.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by bus, check-in at hotel near the Prophet's Mosque.

itinerary.title: Medina Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, historical sites including Quba Mosque, and spend time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description: Begin return journey by bus with comfortable rest stops along the way.

umrahByBus.description: Enjoy a comfortable and extended 14-day Umrah journey by bus. This comprehensive package offers more time for spiritual reflection, comfortable bus travel with premium amenities, and visits to multiple holy cities.

itinerary.description: Begin the journey by comfortable premium air-conditioned bus with reclining seats and entertainment. Travel with fellow pilgrims in a group setting.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Jeddah
itinerary.description: Arrive in Jeddah, rest stop with refreshments, then continue to Mecca. Check-in at comfortable hotel near the Haram.

itinerary.title: Mecca - Extended Umrah Experience
itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, spend extended time at the Grand Mosque, perform multiple Tawaf and Sai, visit historical sites, and engage in deep spiritual reflection.

itinerary.description: Day trip to Jeddah to explore the historic Al-Balad district, visit the Corniche, and experience the Red Sea coastline.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Medina
itinerary.description: Travel to Medina by comfortable bus, check-in at hotel near the Prophet's Mosque.

itinerary.title: Medina Extended Visit
itinerary.description: Visit the Prophet's Mosque, Quba Mosque, historical sites including Uhud Mountain, and spend extended time in prayer and reflection.

itinerary.title: Visit Riyadh
itinerary.description: Day trip to Riyadh to explore the capital city, visit landmarks, and experience modern Saudi Arabia.

itinerary.title: Return Journey Preparation
itinerary.description: Final prayers and preparation for return journey.

itinerary.description: Begin comfortable return journey by bus with rest stops and refreshments.

inclusions: All ground transportation including city tours

itinerary.description: Perform Umrah rituals, spend extended time at the Grand Mosque, perform multiple Tawaf and Sai, visit historical sites, and engage in deep spiritual reflection.
